name: The Adventures of Bufo, The Frog
name_original: The Adventures of Bufo, The Frog
description:
The Assets used in this project, can be downloaded here: Pixel Adventure 1

Commands:

  • Key A: Move to Left;
  • Key D: Move to Right;
  • Key Spacebar: Jump;
  • Key Escape (ESC): Exit the Game.

Observation: This is my first game using Unity, feedbacks and sugestions are welcome. Share and comment with your friends!
